docs.snippet: The declines came as President Vladimir Putin said that the drops had a positive side, in that they would lead Russia to improve financial policies....

headline.main: Russian Shares and Ruble Fall as Oil Prices Continue to Tumble

docs.snippet: Gen. Frank Gorenc, commander of Air Force operations in Europe and Africa, said the Russian strategy, known as anti-access/area denial, or A2/AD, was among the most worrisome trends he had seen....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gen. Frank Gorenc, commander of Air Force operations in Europe and Africa, said the Russian strategy, known as anti-access/area denial, or A2/AD, was among the most worrisome trends he had seen.
docs.abstract: United States Air Force commander in Europe and Africa Gen Frank Gorenc airs worries over sharp increase in Russian missile defenses across Europe and Middle East; says legal deployment, intended to display recent Russian military progress, makes it difficult for NATO to operate.

docs.snippet: The Associated Press on Tuesday published findings from internal IAAF documents that show how track and field's governing body wrestled at multiple levels with rampant doping in Russia....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Associated Press on Tuesday published findings from internal IAAF documents that show how track and field's governing body wrestled at multiple levels with rampant doping in Russia.

headline.main: Q&A: Internal Papers Show IAAF Wrestled With Russia Doping
headline.print_headline: Q&A: Internal Papers Show IAAF Wrestled With Russia Doping

docs.snippet: Six years before the IAAF banned Russia, track and field's governing body knew of doping so out of control it feared Russian athletes could die from abuse of blood-boosting drugs and transfusions, and officials considered collaborating with Russia...
docs.lead_paragraph: Six years before the IAAF banned Russia, track and field's governing body knew of doping so out of control it feared Russian athletes could die from abuse of blood-boosting drugs and transfusions, and officials considered collaborating with Russians to hide the full extent of the cheating before the 2012 London Olympics, according to internal documents obtained by The Associated Press.

headline.main: APNewsBreak: IAAF Officials Explored Covering Up Russia Bans
headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: IAAF Officials Explored Covering Up Russia Bans
